Name: Seafarer's Hearth
Description: Harness the power of the sea, reducing the cooldown of your Hearthstone by ${$a1658}% when used in Kul Tiras and Zandalar.

Name: Swift Landing
Description: Capture the momentum from your recent flight path, increasing your mounted movement speed by ${$a1661}% for ${$a1662} minutes upon landing.

Name: Upgraded Troop Barracks
Description: Construct a larger barracks for your army, increasing the maximum number of troops you can house by ${$a1664}.

Name: Troop Portal Network
Description: Open a portal for transportation of troops from Orgrimmar, allowing troops to be recruited instantly.

Name: Seafarer's Hearth
Description: Harness the power of the sea, reducing the cooldown of your Hearthstone by ${$a1658}% when used in Kul Tiras and Zandalar.

Name: Swift Landing
Description: Capture the momentum from your recent flight path, increasing your mounted movement speed by ${$a1661}% for ${$a1662} minutes upon landing.

Name: Upgraded Troop Barracks
Description: Construct a larger barracks for your army, increasing the maximum number of troops you can house by ${$a1664}.

Name: Troop Portal Network
Description: Open a portal for transportation of troops from Stormwind, allowing troops to be recruited instantly.

Name: Island Plunderer
Description: Learn the pirate secrets of spotting treasure, granting you a chance to receive additional Seafarer's Dubloons on Island Expeditions.

Name: Island Archeologist
Description: Learn the secrets of ancient civilizations, increasing the duration of effects from shrines by ${$a1667}%.

Name: World Azerite Detector
Description: Construct an Azerite detector on your ship, granting you a chance to find additional Azerite when completing World Quests.

Name: Local Transportation
Description: Upgrade your Flight Master's Whistle, allowing you to call for a quick flight back to Zuldazar when using your whistle directly next to a flight master on Zandalar or Kul Tiras.

Name: Warfront Resourcer
Description: Establish access to resources outside of the Warfront, allowing you to enter the battle with ${$a1672} Iron and ${$a1710} Wood.

Name: Warfront General
Description: Learn how to best inspire allies in combat, increasing the effectiveness of your recruited troops by ${$a1674}% while fighting in a Warfront.

Name: Horde Ambassador
Description: Open up additional lines of trade with your new allies, granting additional War Resources from emissary quests.

Name: Island Plunderer
Description: Learn the pirate secrets of spotting treasure, granting you a chance to receive additional Seafarer's Dubloons on Island Expeditions.

Name: Island Archeologist
Description: Learn the secrets of ancient civilizations, increasing the duration of effects from shrines by ${$a1667}%.

Name: World Azerite Detector
Description: Construct an Azerite detector on your ship, granting you a chance to find additional Azerite when completing World Quests.

Name: Local Transportation
Description: Upgrade your Flight Master's Whistle, allowing you to call for a quick flight back to Boralus when using your whistle directly next to a flight master on Zandalar or Kul Tiras.

Name: Warfront Resourcer
Description: Establish access to resources outside of the Warfront, allowing you to enter the battle with ${$a1672} Iron and ${$a1710} Wood.

Name: Warfront General
Description: Learn how to best inspire allies in combat, increasing the effectiveness of your recruited troops by ${$a1674}% while fighting in a Warfront.

Name: Alliance Ambassador
Description: Open up additional lines of trade with your new allies, granting additional War Resources from emissary quests.

Name: Let There Be Light
Description: Allows for you to discover torches which regenerate Sanity inside the Visions of N'Zoth. [NYI]

Name: Know No Fear
Description: Increases your max sanity.[NYI]

Name: The Penitent Shall Pass
Description: Your sanity now passively regenerates. [NYI]

Name: My Name Is Fury
Description: Whenever you take damage that causes you to lose sanity, deal damage to the enemy as well. [NYI]

Name: Friends In The Darkness
Description: Whenever you lose Sanity, chance to summon a friendly void fiend to fight by your side for a short time.[NYI]

Name: Rich Cache
Description: Chests now have a chance to contain stronger torches and greater scrolls in them. [NYI]

Name: Fleeting Vision
Description: Whenever you are inside the Vision, your movement speed is increased. [NYI]

Name: Bountiful Vision
Description: Increases the number of Corrupted Mementos that drop for you. [NYI]

Name: Stalwart Mind
Description: Whenever you are afflicted by a madness, chance instead to benefit from a Boon of Resolve. {NYI]
